H0.text: Sex-linked traits are traits controlled by genes on the sex chromosomes.

H1.text: Male-related traits are traits controlled by genes on the sex chromosomes.

H2.text: Gender-linked traits are traits controlled by genes on the sex chromosomes.

H3.text: Chromosomeâ€‘linked traits are traits controlled by genes on the sex chromosomes.

A4.text: Sex linkage thus refers to the association of a trait encoded by one of the genes on these sex chromosomes.

A5.text: The Y-chromosome is host to the SRY gene, which is involved in the development of several male sex characteristics.
